name: Tank Rampage
description:
Tank Rampage is a team-based multiplayer PvP action game.
Your main goal is to capture this coveted city, but another team will interfere with you, which also wants to have power over it.

COMBAT ACTIONS

Dominate the city with the fog of war - you can tactically inflict significant damage to the enemy from where he cannot expect.


CAPTURE ZONES
To take over the city faster, you must capture the police station or the building of the local television, in order to master the propaganda.


KEY FEATURES
  • up to 4 players online
  • quick and juicy battles
  • destroy opponents with a cannon or machine gun
  • several playable multiplayer arenas
  • great visual effects
